item.description:
It's spring! Time to find love or at least get drunk and pretend you can dance. Seriously guys, it's time to get out of the house and mingle.

 

No age restrictions. All are welcome (even if you're in a relationship, but you can't complain if someone hits on you). This is a drinking and dancing event first with a secondary emphasis on finding your soul mate. So approach this with a positive attitude.

 

The Burren has live music all day http://www.burren.com/calendar.html

The only band on the schedule is the Red Square but check the above URL because when I called they had a whole list prepared which I suspect will be changing.

 

Post this on your facebook page and invite people. The more people who come the more fun this will be. If we get a huge crowd like last time, we can virtually take over the place.

 

No cover before 11pm and definitely check this before you leave the house in the event of a venue change. 

Guaranteed to be fun! Come on out before the MBTA raises the rates!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guy who looks like the organizer
item.name: Singles Drinking, Dancing in Somah-ville!
